summary: A journal/log app where users can create and edit entries. Working on UI improvements including full-width entry text with repositioned edit/delete buttons.

existing_features.title: In EntryCard.tsx, make the journal entry text display full width by removing any width constraints that cause it to share horizontal space with the edit/delete action buttons.

In EntryCard.tsx, reposition the edit and delete buttons so they no longer sit inline beside the entry text. Place them in a dedicated row below the entry text (or as a compact toolbar at the bottom of the card) so they remain accessible without constraining text width.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make entry text full width and reposition edit/delete buttons

projectName: Full-width entry text with repositioned edit/delete buttons
